mdRecord.dcterms:title: Coolidge X-ray tube
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: General Electric Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Coolidge oil-immersed type X-ray tube. This item was given in honor of Theodore E. Keats, M.D., F.A.C.R., Chair of the UVa Department of Radiology from 1963-1991.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by Dr. Daniel L. Seale [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--X-rays--Equipment and supplies
